description: "This map shows the islands of Java, Sumatra and Borneo, the straits of Sunda, Malacca and Bangka, and the Gulf of Siam. The points of the compass can be seen radiating out from a central compass rose."
label: "Les Isles de la Sonde / par le Sr. Robert de Vaugondy Fils de Mr. Robert Geog. du Roi."
